page.title: 14A Newcomer
page.content: {Mrs Lavery}is Scottish.She went to live over in {Germany}at an {army {base .}She lived there for three years and then moved here.She prefers Germany to Gretna because people are more friendly. She thinks there is a lot to do in Gretna for both children and adults.She doesn't enjoy her job in{Carlisle.}She thinks the{Solway}is{ {dangerous}even at low tide. Her road is quiet.The social life in Gretna is not too bad.She doesn't think the market should be stopped.She thinks Gretna has a{good {future}because more people are coming in.She thinks we should have bigger and better shops.She thinks certain classes in the school should have more discipline.
